scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix backend && (test -f frontend/package.json && npm install --prefix frontend || echo "Skipping frontend install: frontend/package.json not found")
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:frontend: test -f frontend/package.json && npm run build --prefix frontend || echo "Skipping frontend build: frontend/package.json not found"
